text: Gertrude Boyle (née Lamfrom; March 6, 1924 – November 3, 2019) was a German- born American businesswoman. Her father started Columbia Sportswear, where she later became president. She was the chairperson of the company from 1983 to her death. Boyle died on November 3, 2019 at her home in Portland, Oregon, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Portland, Oregon Category:Philanthropists from Oregon Category:American autobiographers Category:German businesspeople Category:German autobiographers Category:Writers from Oregon
title: Gert Boyle
